success.title: Subscription Successful!
success.syncingStatus: Syncing your payment status, please wait...
success.emailConfirmation: Subscription confirmation email has been sent to your inbox

errors.title: Payment Processing Failed
errors.noSessionId: Missing session ID, unable to process payment status.
errors.updateFailed: Failed to update transaction status, please try again later.
errors.networkError: Network error or server unresponsive, please check your internet connection.

failed.title: Subscription Failed
failed.message: Sorry, your subscription could not be completed.

suggestedSolutions.title: Suggested Solutions:
suggestedSolutions.checkPaymentInfo: 1. Check if payment information is correct
suggestedSolutions.checkBalance: 2. Confirm sufficient balance in your bank card
